Whip 1 c. whipping cream with powdered sugar until soft peaks form.
Beat 4 egg whites until stiff, but not dry.
Stir in a little whipped cream & egg whites into the chocolate mixture to lighten.
Fold in remaining cream & whites until completely incorporated.
Turn into crust & chill at least 6 hours, preferably overnight.
Whip remaining 1 cup cream with sugar to taste until stiff.
Remove from spring form pan.
Spread whipped cream over top of mousse.
Pipe remaining cream into rosettes.
Freezes very well.
If frozen, thaw overnight in refrigerator.

recipes.name: Holly's Peanut Butter Balls
instructions: Cream butter, peanut butter well.
Gradually add powdered sugar
Stir in rice krispies
Form Mixture into small ball 1” in diameter
Dip into mixture of the Hershey bar, chocolate chips and paraffin wax
Melt chocolate & wax in top of double boiler or in microwave.
Keep warm while dipping balls.
Cool on wax paper.

recipes.name: Yummy Chocolate Brownies
instructions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Melt margarine.
Add cocoa, stir till blended, whisk in brown sugar, eggs, vanilla.
Stir in flour till blended.
Pour in 9x13 inch pan & bake 22-25 min.
Cool & frost.

recipes.name: Penny's Time-Saving Caramels
instructions: In a saucepan, melt butter.
Stir in sugar & salt; then add corn syrup & mix well.
Add condensed milk, stirring constantly, continue stirring & cook to 245 degrees.
Remove from heat and stir in vanilla.
Pour into a 9 inch buttered pan.
When cold, cut into squares & wrap.
Makes about 49 pieces.

recipes.name: Peanut Butter Temptations
ingredients: 1 box (10 oz) Reese's miniature peanut butter cups
instructions: Cream butter, peanut butter & sugar
Beat in egg & vanilla
Add flour, baking soda & salt
Shape into 1 inch balls & place in ungreased 1 1/2 inch muffin tins
Bake @ 375 degrees for 8 – 10 min. or until lightly browned
Immediately after removing from oven, press a peanut butter cup into the center of each cookie until only the top of the peanut butter cup shows
Let cool for 10 min. then carefully remove from tins
Makes 40 cookies

recipes.name: Oven-Baked Caramel Corn
instructions: Pop corn & keep warm in 2 shallow pans in a 250 degree oven
Combine sugar, butter, syrup & salt
Bring to a boil slowly & boil 5 min
Remove from heat
Stir in baking soda
Pour immediately over popped corn & nuts dividing syrup equally between two pans & mix well
Place back in oven & bake for 1 hour stirring every 15 min
Stir once more after removing from oven
Cool & break up
Store in airtight container

recipes.name: Buttery Toffee
ingredients: 1 - 6oz. bar milk chocolate, melted or 6 oz. chocolate pieces
instructions: Combine sugar, butter, half & half, corn syrup & salt in large heavy saucepan
Bring to a boil over low heat, stirring frequently
Continue cooking & stirring until syrup reaches hard crack stage, 300 degrees
Remove from heat; & stir in vanilla
Pour into buttered 13 x 9 inch pan
Cool until firm
Spread melted chocolate evenly over top of candy, sprinkle with nuts
Cool
Break into bite size pieces. 30–36 pieces.

recipes.name: Paul and Di's Hand Dipped Creams
ingredients: 2 – 12 oz. pkg. semi sweet chocolate chips
instructions: Mix all but chocolate mixture ingredients together & chill.
Put small amount in freezer - Roll into balls.
Put back in freezer and dip in chocolate mixture
Melt in Double Boiler
Dip balls in chocolate, place on waxed paper
When set remove from paper & store in refrigerator

recipes.name: Fudge
ingredients: 2/3 c. (5 1/3 fl., oz. can) evaporated milk
instructions: Combine 1 1/2 c. sugar, 6 T. margarine & 1/3 c. milk in 1 1/2 qt. saucepan
Bring to full rolling boil, stirring constantly
Boil 4 minutes over med. heat, stirring constantly
Remove from heat; stir in chocolate pieces 'til melted
Add 1 c. (1/2 jar) marshmallow cream & 1/2 t. vanilla; beat 'til well blended
Pour into greased 13 x 9 inch pan
Repeat with remaining ingredients, substituting peanut butter for chocolate pieces
Spread over chocolate layer
Cool at room temp; cut into squares

recipes.name: Mints
instructions: Cream cheese, add flavoring & coloring
Add powdered sugar until like play dough
Roll in balls the size of a marble & place one side in a small amount of granulated sugar
Press sugаred side into mold, then unmold at once on waxed paper
Makes 23 roses & 23 leaves
Variations:
To make chocolate mints, add 3 t. cocoa & 1/2 t. vanilla.
Flavors:
Lemon - Yellow
Winter green - Pink
Peppermint - White

recipes.name: Krantz
instructions: Heat scalded milk, salt and sugar in a pan, cool
When cool, add 2 pkg dry yeast
Sift 4 c. flour and rind of 1 lemon into bowl
Mix. Cut in 1 c. butter
Blend like pie crust
Add 4 egg yolks (save whites for later) to cooled milk mixture
Pour liquid into flour mixture
Stir with fork
Then make into a ball with hands
Cover
Refrigerate 8 hrs or overnight
Divide into 3 balls, roll thinly to 10 x 22 inch rectangle
Beat 4 egg whites
Add in 1 c. sugar slowly and 1 t. vanilla
Spread egg white mixture on rectangles 1/3 of mixture on each
Add nuts and/or cinnamon and sugar
Roll up on long side
Place in round cake pan greased twisting as you place it
Let rise 30 min covered
Bake:
Frost - decorate with sprinkles or candies

recipes.name: Kathy's Play Dough
instructions: Mix flour and alum together in a bowl
Heat the water, salt, oil and food coloring to boiling
Stir liquids into dry ingredients
Knead until smooth on floured surface
Store in airtight container

instructions: Mix all ingredients together
